casebody.data:
No. 10-6701. Eugene Wideman, Jr., Petitioner v. Colorado; and Eugene Wideman, Jr., Petitioner v. Amelia Garcia. 562 U.S. 1142, 131 S. Ct. 907,

178 L. Ed. 2d 761,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 333. January 10, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 382 Fed. Appx. 743 (first judgment); and 382 Fed. Appx. 741 (second judgment).
